enemies.name: Microbe
enemies.dialog: Heh heh... you can't see me, but I'm *everywhere*. I'm the unseen invader—bacteria, viruses, and worse. I slip into your skin, your breath... your bloodstream. Think you can stop me with just soap? *Hint: Microbes are everywhere—some are helpful, but many can be dangerous without hygiene. Washing hands really matters!*

enemies.name: Toxic Crawler
enemies.dialog: Cough... cough... do you smell that? It's the stench of decay. I'm born from pollution and rot, and I *feed* on your clean world. Antidotes? Hah! Let's see if you can survive my poison fog. *Did you know? Toxic substances can be natural or man-made, and knowing how to neutralize them is key to survival.*

enemies.name: Mutant DNA
enemies.dialog: You're still alive? How... disappointing. I was once human... once. Now I twist genes like threads in a web. Mutation... evolution... corruption. Are you ready to meet your *genetic destiny*? *Remember: DNA mutations can cause diseases, but they're also how species evolve. Mutation isn't always bad—it’s how change happens.*

enemies.name: Quark
enemies.dialog: Flicker... flicker... I'm the particle that shouldn't exist. I twitch between realities, obeying no logic. In this realm, chaos reigns—and *I'm its architect*. *Quarks are the smallest building blocks of matter—they make up protons and neutrons, the core of every atom.*

enemies.name: Graviton
enemies.dialog: You feel that pull? It's me... dragging you down. Gravity is not your friend here. I’ll crush your hopes under forces you can't even see. Escape? Impossible. *Gravitons are theoretical particles that explain gravity on the quantum level. Scientists are still searching for proof of their existence.*

enemies.name: Black Hole
enemies.dialog: *Whispers from beyond...* You’ve crossed the event horizon now. Light, matter, even time—it all ends here. Scream if you like. No one will hear you inside the singularity. *Black holes are real, and their gravity is so strong that even light can’t escape. They’re the ultimate test of physics!*

enemies.name: Atom
enemies.dialog: So small... so dangerous. I am the foundation of all things—and your *undoing*. One spark, one wrong reaction, and BOOM... I scatter your essence into the void. *Atoms are the smallest unit of matter, made of protons, neutrons, and electrons. They’re everywhere—even in you.*

enemies.name: Molecule
enemies.dialog: We are bound... and yet unstable. I hold together by forces you don’t understand. Break my bonds, and watch your reality dissolve into a haze of strange fumes. *Molecules form when atoms bond together. Their structure determines everything—from water to poison.*

enemies.name: Reaction Master
enemies.dialog: The laboratory whispers my name... every explosion, every burst of acid. I control the reactions, I ignite the chaos. Bow before your *catalyst king*, or be *consumed in fire and foam*! *Chemical reactions change matter. Catalysts speed them up without being changed themselves—like magic, but scientific!*
